items.name: Golden Calamari
items.description: Marinated calamari breaded and cooked to order. Served with roasted garlic lemon aioli and a spicy Sriracha cocktail sauce.

items.name: Featured Soup
items.description: Ask for today's unique and delicious feature.

items.name: The Classic Burger
items.description: A great flame-grilled patty standing alone in all its glory.

items.name: Sauced Up Chicken Fingers
items.description: Our legendary Chicken Fingers tossed in your choice of mild, medium or hot Buffalo wing sauce. Served with Yukon Gold fries and dipping sauce.

items.name: Pad Thai
items.description: Rice noodles with bean sprouts, caramelized onions, fried egg, red peppers, green onions and crushed peanuts in a tamarind Pad Thai sauce. Topped with your choice of sweet & spicy tofu, chicken or shrimp.

items.name: New York Vanilla Cheesecake
items.description: Made with only the finest ingredients! A deliciously rich and smooth cheesecake with a graham cracker crust. Served with your choice of topping: Chocolate, Caramel or Bumbleberry.

items.name: Freshly Squeezed Sparkling Lemonade
items.description: Also available as Limeade, Orangeade or Cranberry-Lemonade

items.name: Soda
items.description: Coca Cola, Pepsi, Sprite, Mountain Dew
